c74object.name: fluid.pca~
c74object.digest: Dimensionality Reduction with Principal Component Analysis

div.p: Principal Components Analysis of a fluid.dataset~

c74object.discussion:
Open the Overview Patch
fluid.pca~ is part of the Fluid Decomposition Toolkit of the FluCoMa project. For more explanations, learning material, and discussions on its musicianly uses, visit flucoma.org.

method.name: reset
method.digest: Return the object to its original state
method.description: Calling reset will change parameter values back to those the object was created with, i.e. any attribute values set in the box will be retained

div.p: Train this model on a fluid.dataset~ but don't transform the data

Given a trained model, apply the reduction to a source fluid.dataset~ and write to a destination. Can be the same for both input and output (in-place). Returns the fraction of accounted variance, aka the fidelity of the new representation: a value near 1.0 means a higher fidelity to the original.

ul.li:
sourceDataSet:
Source data, or the DataSet name

destDataSet:
Destination data, or the DataSet name

div.p: fluid.pca#fit~ and fluid.pca#transform~ in a single pass. Returns the fraction of accounted variance, aka the fidelity of the new representation: a value near 1.0 means a higher fidelity to the original.

ul.li:
sourceDataSet:
Source data, or the DataSet name

destDataSet:
Destination data, or the DataSet name

div.p: Given a trained model, transform the data point in a buffer~ and write to an output buffer.
The number of columns (dimensions) in this model or dataset / labeset
The number of data points (entries / observations) in this model or dataset / labeset
Resets the internal state of the model

method.name: load
method.description: Replace the internal state of the object from a dict. The message should take the form load dictionary <dictid>

method.name: dump
method.digest: Dump the state of this object from the dump outlet as a dict.

method.name: read
method.description: Replace the internal state of the object from a JSON file on disk. With no argument, a file dialog will appear to choose the file.

method.name: write
method.description: Save the internal state of the object to a JSON file on disk. With no argument, a file dialog will appear to choose the file.

div.p: The number of dimensions to reduce to
Enable warnings to be issued whenever a parameter value is constrained (e.g. clipped)
